rukus.text: Arau yisakale atyacaraita horaara pichata allahara pathata hijarata karaiche, arasye ami te'omlokaka prthiraita uttama abasa pradana karaima; arau akhiraatara puraskara niscaya iyatakaiyo sraestha. Yadi sihamte janilehemtena
yisakale dhairya dharana karae arau te'omlokara pratipalakara oparata nirbhara karae
Arau tomara purbe ami ahisaha kerala purausasakalake'i praerana karaichilo, eteke yadi tomaloke najana tente jnanisakalaka sudhi loraa

spasta pramanadi arau grantharalisaha. Arau ami tomara prati kora'ana aratirna karaicho, yate tumi manuhara babe se'ito spasta karai diba paraa yito sihamtara prati aratirna karaa haiche lagate yate manuhe (e'i bisaye) cinta-carca karae

Yisakale beya karmara sarayantra karae, allahe sihamtaka bhugarbhata bilina nakaraiba buli sihamte nirbhaya hai gaiche neki, ne upalabdhi karaiba noraaraa tha'ira paraa sihamtara oparata sasti nahiba buli sihamte nirbhaya haiche
athaba sihamte cala-phuraa karaa arasthata te'om sihamtaka graeptara nakaraiba buli sihamta nirbhaya haiche neki? Athaca sihamte seya byartha'o karaiba noraaraiba
Athaba te'om sihamtaka bhita-santrasta arasthata graeptara nakaraiba buli nirbhaya haiche neki? Niscaya tomalokara raba ati snehasila, parama dayalu
Sihamte allahe srsti karaa bastura prati laksya nakarae neki, yara cham somphale arau ba'omphale allahara prati chajadaranata hai dhali parae, arau se'ibora ekanta binita
akasasamuha arau prthiraita yimana jira-jantu arau phiraista ache se'i sakalo kerala allahake'i chajadaha karae, te'omloka ahankara nakarae
Te'omloke te'omlokara oparata thaka pratipalakaka bhaya karae arau te'omlokaka yi nirdesa diya haya te'omloke se'itorae karae
